script.translation[0].definitions[0].def: the written form of a speech, play, film etc
script.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: They write all their own scripts.
script.translation[0].definitions[1].def: the set of letters that are used in writing a language
script.translation[0].definitions[2].def: a piece of work that a student writes in an examination
script.translation[0].definitions[3].exa: a diary entry written in neat black script
script.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a simple program or series of instructions for a computer, or the language that is used to write these
script.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: A Windows logon script will assign a printer to a computer.
